page.title: 11SEDGEFIELD VILLAGE GREEN
page.content: The village green is situated at the intersection of the B1278 and Front St.The green is the starting point for the{Ball Game}and the centre point of the{Medieval Fair}it is also the shopping centre for the village. The village supports two super- markets as well as a general dealers. Chemist,Butchers,Hairdressers,D.I.Y., Library,Public Houses,Estate Agents, Clothes,Knitting and Dressmaking shops are all to be found gathered around the green.Behind the church the old forge has been reopened and is used by a potter to produce and sell his wares Also to be found,{St.Edmunds}the medieval church,the Roman Catholic church of{St.John Fisher}(This church celebrated it's 50th.aniversary in 1985)Close by is the Methodist Hall. The green is the central point where inhabitants can be seen conversing.
